description.english: You release the sellsword
Complete Joe’s Moneymaking Dream
Complete A Mysterious Stone
Complete Oni's Past
Complete The Stone Statue's Origin
Complete Fishing Master
Complete The Meaning of Life
Complete Secrets in the Confessional
Complete Red Mushroom, White Mushroom
Complete The Spy
Complete A Substitute Priest
Complete The Bet
Complete It's Good to be Alive
Complete The Twins
Complete Hero Dogs
Complete The Cycle
Complete Aelred‘s Treasure Chest
description.schinese: 完成埃尔勒德的藏宝箱
description.tchinese: 完成埃爾勒德的藏寶箱

description.english: Complete Tina's Request
You resurrect the witch

displayName.english: The green hills and rivers remain the same

description.english: Having attained invincibility, you return to your hometown
description.schinese: 领悟了无敌，你回到故乡
description.tchinese: 領悟了無敵，你回到故鄉

displayName.english: How many times has the sunset spread its flame

description.english: Having attained invincibility, you have lost your once familiar homeland
description.schinese: 领悟了无敌，但却失去曾经的家园
description.tchinese: 領悟了無敵，但卻失去曾經的家園

description.english: In the endless battle, you are covered in wounds
description.schinese: 在无止尽的战斗中，你满身是伤
description.tchinese: 在無止盡的戰鬥中，你滿身是傷

description.english: You see a void before you
The crowd bids you farewell
Even the Lizard-man looks down upon you
description.schinese: 就连蜥蜴人都看不起你的行为
description.tchinese: 就連蜥蜴人都看不起你的行為

description.english: You'll do anything to be the strongest
description.schinese: 只要成为最强，你什么都愿意
description.tchinese: 只要成為最強，你什麼都願意

description.english: Selling one's soul is harder than imagined
description.schinese: 出卖自己的灵魂比想像中困难
description.tchinese: 出賣自己的靈魂比想像中困難

description.english: You never knew you'd end up on the same boat with him
description.schinese: 你作梦也没想到会跟他同船
description.tchinese: 你作夢也沒想到會跟他同船

description.english: You understand your own limits
Joe became an adventurer
Your arrival hasn't changed Joy Valley
description.schinese: 你的到来并没有改变欢乐谷
description.tchinese: 你的到來並沒有改變歡樂谷

description.english: The Joy Valley became impoverished
description.schinese: 失去红宝石的欢乐谷变得贫穷
description.tchinese: 失去紅寶石的歡樂谷變得貧窮

description.english: The Joy Valley became a money-making tool
description.schinese: 欢乐谷成为赚钱的工具
description.tchinese: 歡樂谷成為賺錢的工具

description.english: Thank you for playing
Meelia names you

displayName.english: The adventure has come to an end

description.english: After all the ups and downs, your adventure has drawn to a close
description.schinese: 经历风风雨雨，你的冒险画上了句点
description.tchinese: 經歷風風雨雨，你的冒險畫上了句點

description.english: The evidence is conclusive. The master key is in the lion's room
description.schinese: 证据确凿，万能钥匙就在狮子的房间里，它一定是凶手
description.tchinese: 證據確鑿，萬用鑰匙就在獅子的房間裡，牠一定是兇手

description.english: The crocodile is clever and cunning, but he can't fool me
description.schinese: 鳄鱼聪明又狡猾，但他骗不过我的，它一定是凶手
description.tchinese: 鱷魚聰明又狡猾，但他騙不過我的，牠一定是兇手

description.english: The hyena's behavior is abnormal, and combined with the witness's statement, He must be the killer
description.schinese: 鬣狗的行为举止都不正常，加上目击者的说辞，它一定是凶手
description.tchinese: 鬣狗的行為舉止都不正常，加上目擊者的說詞，牠一定是兇手

description.english: I left the Thunderstone for those who need it more
description.schinese: 我把雷鸣石留给更需要的人
description.tchinese: 我把雷鳴石留給更需要的人

description.english: This is how the strange soil came to be...
description.schinese: 奇怪的泥土就是这样来的……
description.tchinese: 奇怪的泥土就是這樣來的……

description.english: I cannot forgive him......
She must go, it's necessary

displayName.english: Solving the Problem from the Source

description.english: Will this kick solve all problems?
description.schinese: 这一踢就能解决所有问题了吗？
description.tchinese: 這一踢就能解決所有問題了嗎?

description.english: The book hidden deep in the bookcase without any text
description.schinese: 藏在书柜深处没有文字的书
description.tchinese: 藏在書櫃深處沒有文字的書

description.english: Robert's father's purple coat under the bed...
description.schinese: 罗伯特父亲床底下的紫色大衣……
description.tchinese: 羅伯特父親床底下紫色的大衣……

description.english: One way to solve the problem
One gold coin for a shoe shine service
description.schinese: 一个金币换擦鞋的服务
description.tchinese: 一個金幣換擦鞋的服務

description.english: In a small space, there was no escape
description.schinese: 在狭小的空间中，无处可逃
description.tchinese: 在狹小的空間中，無處可逃

description.english: Jumped off the cliff for no reason...
You just wanted to taste it but died from poisoning
description.schinese: 你只是想试试味道，却因中毒而死
description.tchinese: 你只是想試試味道，卻因中毒而死

description.english: The best defense is a good offense
You can't move, until the end of time...
description.schinese: 你无法动，直到时间的尽头……
description.tchinese: 你無法動，直到時間的盡頭……

description.english: You were eaten by the lion
You were bitten to death by the hyena
With such power, he can't be human
description.schinese: 拥有这种力量的他，不可能是人类
description.tchinese: 擁有這種力量的他，不可能是人類

description.english: Even the strongest adventurer can't overcome worn knees
description.schinese: 再强的冒险者也敌不过膝盖的磨损
description.tchinese: 在強的冒險者終敵不過膝蓋的磨損

description.english: Where is this place?
It's a pity, I couldn't stop it
I know their tricks
The meat has a bit of a sour taste
They came in handy, but the price was a bit high
description.schinese: 它们派上用场了，只是价格有点贵
description.tchinese: 它們派上用場了，只是價格有點貴

description.english: I must remove it, but...
A dignified death
You got kicked out by Oni
description.schinese: 贪玩的你被欧尼赶出去
description.tchinese: 貪玩的你被歐尼趕出去

description.english: You are causing trouble in the sacred church
description.schinese: 你在神圣的教堂里捣蛋
description.tchinese: 你在神聖的教堂裡搗蛋

description.english: You unlocked the late-night conversation

displayName.schinese: 千错万错都不是我的错
displayName.tchinese: 千錯萬錯都不是我的錯

description.english: This must be the elder's fault
You light the candles in the inn
There's nothing in the jar
Who is this for?
Let’s try it on an animal

displayName.english: Purchased The Key to the Beyond

description.english: This can be used where?
The consequences of ignoring warnings
